summary: We testified on the 340B Drug Discount Program before the U.S. Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor & Pensions. Our statement is based primarily on the following reports: Drug Discount Program: Federal Oversight of Compliance at 340B Contract Pharmacies Needs Improvement 340B Drug Discount Program: Increased Oversight Needed to Ensure Nongovernmental Hospitals Meet Eligibility Requirements 340B Drug Discount Program: Oversight of the Intersection with the...
title: 340B Drug Discount Program: Agency Oversight Has Improved, but Actions Needed to Address Weaknesses
